00028 #ifndef PLOTCOMPONENT_H
00029 #define PLOTCOMPONENT_H
00030 
00031 #include <vtkActor.h>
00032 #include <vtkVolume.h>
00033 #include <vtkProp3D.h>
00034 #include <vtkPlanes.h>
00035 #include <vtkMapper.h>
00036 #include <vtkVolumeMapper.h>
00037 #include <vtkPlaneCollection.h>
00038 #include "ObjectHandle.h"
00039 
00040 #define SUBMIT(pipe, prop)\
00041 PlotComponent *comp = PlotComponent::NewComponent(prop);\
00042 pipe->Submit(comp);\
00043 ObjectHandle<PlotComponent> *compHandle = new ObjectHandle<PlotComponent>(comp);\
00044 plhs[0] = compHandle->to_mex_handle()
00045 
00046 class PlotComponent
00047 {
00048 public:
00049 
00050     static PlotComponent* NewComponent(vtkActor* actor);
00051     static PlotComponent* NewComponent(vtkVolume* volume);
00052 
00053 
00054     virtual vtkProp3D* GetProp() { return NULL; }
00055 
00056     void SetCropPlanes(vtkPlanes *planes) {
00057       mapper->SetClippingPlanes(planes);
00058     }
00059 
00060     void SetCropPlanes(vtkPlaneCollection *planes) {
00061       mapper->SetClippingPlanes(planes);
00062     }
00063 
00064     virtual ~PlotComponent() { }
00065   protected:
00066     vtkAbstractMapper *mapper;
00067 };
00068 
00069 class ActorPlotComponent : public PlotComponent {
00070 
00071   public:
00072 
00073     ActorPlotComponent(vtkActor *actor) {
00074       this->actor = actor;
00075       this->mapper = vtkAbstractMapper::SafeDownCast(actor->GetMapper());
00076     }
00077 
00078     vtkProp3D* GetProp() { return dynamic_cast<vtkProp3D*>(actor); }
00079 
00080   private:
00081     vtkActor *actor;
00082 };
00083 
00084 class VolumePlotComponent : public PlotComponent {
00085 
00086   public:
00087 
00088     VolumePlotComponent(vtkVolume *volume) {
00089       this->volume = volume;
00090       this->mapper = vtkAbstractMapper::SafeDownCast(volume->GetMapper());
00091     }
00092 
00093     vtkProp3D* GetProp() { return dynamic_cast<vtkProp3D*>(volume); }
00094 
00095   private:
00096     vtkVolume *volume;
00097 };
00098 
00099 #endif // PLOTCOMPONENT_H
